Basic functions

Source: vignettes/basics.Rmd
basics.Rmd
library(rCAX)

Show the available tables

Only the name and id columns are shown.

tab <- rcax_tables(cols=c("name", "id"))
head(tab)
#>                           name                                   id
#> 1             SuperPopulations 009A08FE-6479-44FC-9B6F-01C55E2C8BA3
#> 2                  XPortCA_PNI 0474CE96-789B-4E16-8FD5-05C431E5034A
#> 3                  EscData4GIS 0603946B-84FF-450D-8F3E-C2513517126D
#> 4 XPortCA_PresmoltAbundance_01 086448AE-4F1F-4FE1-B794-6CC4FB0C451F
#> 5                    Reference 1FB86FDA-2DC0-4FCD-9B7F-E37C0C57114F
#> 6             HatchRetMain4GIS 26F6E3E9-E5C8-40FF-9AEC-B7F8500F1A44

Get a NOSA table for a popid

Here the columns are restricted. popid is passed in as a query param to limit the query to popid=7.

tab <- rcax_nosa(
  qlist=list(popid=7), 
  cols=c("popid", "spawningyear", "nosaij", "nosaej"))
head(tab)
#>   popid spawningyear nosaij nosaej
#> 1     7         2005     38     35
#> 2     7         2011    615    540
#> 3     7         2014    570    531
#> 4     7         2013    511       
#> 5     7         1997     72     72
#> 6     7         1993    107     99

Get a NOSA table with all the columns

Get the table and show all the column names.

rcax_nosa(type="colnames")
#>   [1] "nosaijupperlimit"        "tsaej"                  
#>   [3] "age8propupperlimit"      "metriclocation"         
#>   [5] "popfitnotes"             "cbfwapopname"
